Title: 41154 - # Ways Technology Helps You Get Your Music Fix on the Go
Direction: 675 words. Discuss 4-8 ways that technology allows us to keep listening to music, even when we’re on the go. You can talk about music streaming apps like Tidal or Spotify, or gadgets like noise cancelling headphones or earbuds, etc. You can also mention devices like smartphones or tablets that allow you to store your music and take it with you everywhere. Your target audience is interested in technology, so write for a tech-minded audience. You can link to the target URL by including a section on noise canceling earbuds. Please make sure you DO NOT link to any competitor products.
Anchor Text: noise canceling earbuds branded term (brand/client name)
Extra Writer Notes: Examples: listen with Sony's noise canceling earbuds
